name: Plundr'r
description:
Did your party of adventurers forget to bring along a rogue, and now there's a big dumb lock between you and all your hard earned loot? Or, did you bring a rouge, but it turned out they're one of those "I just shoot arrows and stab people" rogues? DO NOT CRY, Plundr is here to help. Simply make start a Plundr request through your personal magical hand mirror and a Plundr Providr will be sent to aid you as soon as possible. Thanks, Plundr!

Plundr'r follows a week in the life of Gobtod, a perpetually unemployed Goblin who's run afoul a gang of wizards and mages after falling into debt with them. Desperate for quick cash, Gobtod stumbles upon the Plundr service and decides to give it a shot.
